title: Disclosure Of Event Or Information Under Regulation 30 Of SEBI (LODR) Regulations, 2015 30 May - ONGC fined ₹13.03 lakh each by BSE and NSE for board composition non-compliance, seeking fine waiver.
date: 30 May - ONGC fined ₹13.03 lakh each by BSE and NSE for board composition non-compliance, seeking fine waiver.

title: Compliances-Reg.24(A)-Annual Secretarial Compliance 30 May - ONGC's FY 2024-25 secretarial compliance report shows governance non-compliances; waiver requests submitted for fines.
date: 30 May - ONGC's FY 2024-25 secretarial compliance report shows governance non-compliances; waiver requests submitted for fines.

title: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Analyst / Investor Meet - Intimation 29 May - ONGC schedules investor meetings at Bank of America and Morgan Stanley India forums on June 4, 2025.
date: 29 May - ONGC schedules investor meetings at Bank of America and Morgan Stanley India forums on June 4, 2025.

title: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Earnings Call Transcript 28 May
Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Press Release / Media Release 25 May - Production resumed at offshore PY-3 field after 14 years; Phase I completed, Phase II planned for enhanced recovery.
date: 25 May - Production resumed at offshore PY-3 field after 14 years; Phase I completed, Phase II planned for enhanced recovery.
